WEATHER FORECAST FOR 15 SEPTEMBER 2025
Issued at 05.30 a.m. on 15 September 2025

S
everal spells of showers will occur in Western and Sabaragamuwa provinces and in Galle, Matara,
Kandy and Nuwara-Eliya districts.

S
howers  or  thundershowers  will  occur  at  several  places  in  Uva  and  Eastern  provinces  and  in
Hambantota district after 1.00 p.m. Fairly heavy falls about 50 mm are likely at some places.

C
loudy skies can be expected over Eastern, Uva, Central and Southern provinces.

T
he general public  is kindly requested to take adequate precautions to minimize damages caused by
temporary localized strong winds and lightning during thundershowers.
